Mr Harry Hughes

Family Links

Mr Harry Hughes 1

  • Born: Cir 1876, Pontesbury, Shropshire, England 1

  Noted events in his life were:

• Residence: census, 1881, Coal pit Lane, Longden Common, Pontesbury, Shropshire, England. 2

• Occupation: Coal Miner, 1891, Pontesbury, Shropshire, England. 3

• Residence: census, 1891, Longden Common, Pontesbury, Shropshire, England. 3

• Residence: census, 1901, Longden Common, Pontesbury, Shropshire, England. 4

• Occupation: Coal Hewer, 1901, Pontesbury, Shropshire, England. 4
